alert.note: Alert for DuPage; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 8:51PM CST until January 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Wet snow and slippery travel conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and wind gusts in excess of 40 mph expected. The highest snow totals will be across the western portions of impacted counties. * WHERE...DuPage and Northern Cook Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates will exceed 1 inch per hour at times early Tuesday morning. The strongest winds will occur Tuesday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
